endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all monitored industrial machines and their current status.
Fetch detailed information, including specifications and operational history, of a specific machine identified by 'id'.
Submit a maintenance schedule entry for a specific machine to plan future service activities.
Retrieve a list of upcoming maintenance reminders categorized by urgency and machine.
Obtain detailed performance analytics for a selected timeframe and set of machines.
Configure alert parameters for specific conditions such as temperature thresholds or operational hours.
Access logs of all generated alerts including timestamps and significance levels.
Register a new industrial machine into the monitoring system.
Remove a specific machine identified by 'id' from the monitoring database.
Generate a comprehensive summary report for all managed machines over a chosen period.
